attributes.action: Aspartame: call to get this poision banned
attributes.additional_details:
Aspartame is an artificial sweetener that is in most diet drinks and low calorie foods. It a sweet poison. It has many side affects including headaches, nausea, dizziness and tumours. A full list of the side affects can be found here:http://www.sweetpoison.com/aspartame-side-effects.html

This is a call to get it banned!
